text: Lance White is an American college basketball coach who is currently the head coach of the Pittsburgh Panthers women's basketball team. White previously served as an assistant coach at Texas Tech and Florida State. He was an assistant at Texas Tech for 10 seasons and was named an assistant at FSU in 2003. White was named the head coach at Pitt in April 2018. == Head coaching record == == References == == External links == * Pitt Panthers bio Category:Living people Category:College basketball coaches in the United States Category:Women's basketball coaches Category:Florida State Seminoles women's basketball coaches Category:Pittsburgh Panthers women's basketball coaches Category:Texas Tech Lady Raiders basketball coaches Category:Texas Tech University alumni Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Lance White (basketball)
